q: form You saw the filibuster, now read the book. The 8 1/2- hour speech given by Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., on Dec. 10 decrying proposed tax cuts is being published by Nation Books as The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class, Sen. Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday. The book is to become available in mid-February, while an e-book edition will be available Jan. 28, Nation Books said in a news release. Voters are not re-embracing conservative ideology. But we must acknowledge that the left's agenda has not won the support of a majority of Americans-- and, based on that recognition, we must steer a more moderate course. Barack Obama has put into place a staff structure that would allow for a shift toward the center-left.
